title: You have been Blocked!
itunes:title: You have been Blocked!
description:
Monday 8/13 - Today on the show after Nicki Minaj broke the internet over the weekend with her new album " Queen" we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about it. In fact one of our listeners loved the album, but to bad Nicki will never know because she blocked him. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see how many of our listeners been blocked by a celebrity. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Arthur Williams the officer who was caught on camera attacking a man.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 8/13 - Today on the show after Nicki Minaj broke the internet over the weekend with her new album " Queen" we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about it. In fact one of our listeners loved the album, but to bad Nicki will never know because she blocked him. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see how many of our listeners been blocked by a celebrity. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Arthur Williams the officer who was caught on camera attacking a man.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
